basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Enterococcus faecalis, E. faecium WHE, E. hirae, E. pseudoavium, E. sulfureus, E. saccharolyticus, E. columbae, Lactobacillus plantarum, L. acidophilus, Lactobacillus sakeii subsp. sakei, L. paracasei subsp. paracasei, Lactococcus lactis, Lactococcus lactis subsp. cremoris, Leuconostoc mesenteroides, Bacillus subtilis, Bacillus cereus, Listeria innocua, Listeria monocytogenes, Staphylococcus xylosus, Staphylococcus aureus;Gram-negative bacteria:Salmonella enterica serovar Typhimurium, S. enterica serovar Infantis, Klebsiella pneumoniae, Serratia liquefaciens, Proteus vulgaris, Enterobacter cloacae, Escherichia coli.
